#summary Guide to using gource with Mercurial

[http://code.google.com/u/mwu368/ mwu368] has contributed a python script  [http://gource.googlecode.com/issues/attachment?aid=6626085821485014306&name=mercurial_gourcelog.py mercurial_gourcelog.py] that can be used to show a Mercurial repository in gource using the 'custom' log format option.

Usage:

{{{
 mercurial_gourcelog.py [OUTPUT_FILE]
}}}

Where `OUTPUT_FILE` is the output file for the custom log. If `OUTPUT_FILE` is not provided, output will go to stdout.

Example usage with gource (assuming that gource is installed):

{{{
mercurial_gourcelog.py project.log && gource project.log
}}}

Or piping directly into gource:

{{{
mercurial_gourcelog.py | gource --log-format custom -
}}}
